snippet: The Garmin team pulled out of the Tour of the Mediterranean ahead of the fourth stage after 17 of its bikes were stolen from a hotel parking lot in southern France.
abstract: Garmin cycling team pulls out of Tour of the Mediterranean after 17 of its bikes are stolen from hotel parking lot in southern France.
lead_paragraph: The Garmin team pulled out of the Tour of the Mediterranean ahead of the fourth stage after 17 of its bikes were stolen from a hotel parking lot in southern France.

headline.seo: Garmin Exits Tour of the Mediterranean After Theft of Bikes
